Class Swift_Plugin_BandwidthMonitor

Description
Description | Descendents | Vars (details) | Methods (details)

Implements interfaces:

  • Swift_Events_CommandListener
  • Swift_Events_ResponseListener

Swift Bandwidth Monitor.

Tracks bytes in and out of the connection.

  • author: Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk>
